title: New: Four Tet – 128 Harps
body:
**Kieran Hebden** is, in my mind, one of the most innovative producers of all time, even if just for his intense attention to detail.

Case in point: new track _128 Harps_, blending classical instrumentation sections with wiry beats and spliced vocal samples. Where **Four Tet** excels is through the journey he guides the listener along, seeing his music as more of a palette than merely a four minute expanse of time that needs filling, and you can’t help but feel that he’s getting better all the time.
